body:
Alright, so. One of my friends has an older sister, she is currently 22, and she was denied from multiple jobs. As this makes him, and his entire family stressful, I want the Avicus community to help out! (Notice, this fund wasnt created by me as there is a video explaining everything you need...) 

If you visit this site: http://www.gofundme.com/jaox64
and donate to help my friends sister in life to care for her children and make herself the happiest life she can... Here is the video explaining it: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=soV97BRUayg
 
I really hope we can help out, as I've donated the best I've could, and I want you guys to know this..
 
Again, dont think its a scam.. take a look at this: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=soV97BRUayg
 
Thank you <3
 
Again any donation counts! :D

title: Help a family!

replies.body: I wish I could donate but there's a certain time where my parents let me use many through the internet :(
